meanings: (한곳에) gather, flock, assemble, congregate, come[get] together, (만나다) meet
(돈·물건 등이) accumulate, be gathered, be collected, be amassed

vlive.korean: 이렇게 모인 이유가 뭘까요? and what's the reason for gathering together? 듣기 View video Dispatch : [ⓓxV] 세븐틴의 2020 운수대통 신년카드① (SEVENTEEN)
vlive.english: and what's the reason for gathering together?

vlive.korean: 매력이죠 - 인간적인 약간 사람 냄새나는 사람들이 딱 모인 느낌? I agree. - They're just so human. 듣기 View video OSEN : PENTAGON 펜타곤, 귀여운 2인 1조 TMI 인터뷰 #스타로드 05
vlive.english: I agree. - They're just so human.

vlive.korean: 그래서 여러분들 저희 7명이 모인 이유가 뭘까요? Why do you think 7 of us are together now? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [GOT7] 눈 덩어리보다 더 반가운 덩어리들,, 아이러브유💚 (GOT7’s acrostic poem bet)
vlive.english: Why do you think 7 of us are together now?

vlive.korean: 그래서 여러분들 저희 일곱 명이 모인 이유가 뭘까요? Why do you think 7 of us are together now? 듣기 View video GOT7 : 눈 덩어리💚
vlive.english: Why do you think 7 of us are together now?

vlive.korean: [며칠 뒤 성호의 개인 작업실에 모인 성균관대 꾼] 일단 비트를 한번 틀어볼까? [GGUN gathered at Seongho's studio] Shall we listen to the beat first? 듣기 View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 21. 각성해서 나타난 성균관대 꾼!! 서울대 츄플의 위기??!!
vlive.english: [GGUN gathered at Seongho's studio] Shall we listen to the beat first?

examples.korean: He bowed low to the assembled crowd. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 모인 군중들에게 깊이 허리 숙여 절을 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He bowed low to the assembled crowd. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It is bad manners to whisper in company. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 사람들이 모인 곳에서 귓속말을 하는 것은 나쁜 태도이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It is bad manners to whisper in company. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: eager crowds outside the stadium 듣기 Add to Wordbook 경기장 밖에 모인 열렬한 관중들 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: eager crowds outside the stadium Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The crowd dispersed quickly. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 모인 사람들이 재빨리 흩어졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: The president nodded to the crowd as he passed in the motorcade. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 대통령이 자동차를 타고 퍼레이드를 하면서 모인 사람들에게 고개를 까딱해 보였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The president nodded to the crowd as he passed in the motorcade. Add to Wordbook
